# How to play

```
$ blackjackpy
Player( 6):  2(C) 4(S)
Dealer(--):  5(C) *(*)
Draw? (y/n) y
Player(16):  2(C) 4(S) J(C)
Dealer(--):  5(C) *(*)
Draw? (y/n) n
Player(16):  2(C) 4(S) J(C)
Dealer(17):  5(C) 3(C) 9(S)
You lose.
```

```
$ blackjackpy
Player(20): 10(S) K(C)
Dealer(--):  7(C) *(*)
Draw? (y/n) n
Player(20): 10(S) K(C)
Dealer(18):  7(C) A(H)
You win.
```

# Ref.

See: https://pyq.jp/quests/blackjack/
